titles.title: To express the support of the House of Representatives for programs such as the Jump$tart Coalition for Personal Financial Literacy.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Education and the Workforce.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Early Childhood, Youth and Families.

committee.name: House Committee on Education and the Workforce

bill.summary: 5/22/1997--Introduced. Expresses the sense of the House that the goal of having young adults who can enter the mainstream of an increasingly complex financial world with confidence and prudence is one which can be advanced through coordinated efforts such as the Jump$tart Coalition for Personal Financial Literacy.
